description: Teamed up with a designer to breathe life into a promotional webpage. Users can get counseling from different mentors who are certified. They can engage with everyone. In our team all types of counselor are available which beautify the web application
challenges: When I am building this web application, I found lot of troubles. Especially the banner animated image. At last I downloaded the image from freepik.com. It gave me a lot of searching experience during finding the appropriate image. I search many websites in the internet then finally I found it. I face nothing more complicated but the animated image.

description: The main purpose is to create a simple sports related web application. Consumers can buy and explore the latest equipments. In our shop all kinds of sports accessories are available.
challenges: When I am building this web application, I found lot of troubles. Delete and update functionalities gave me headache. At last I overcame the trouble. One of my partner who is also a developer assist me to cope with this situation

description: A simple recommendation web application where user can review and add their query. Our application is based on all age ratio people. They can find their desirable products based on the review and comments.
challenges: When I am building this web application, I found lot of troubles. The My Recommendation page and jwt token gave a lot pain. I got thousands of error when I coding into the web application. But at last I found peace after making it usable.
